name: snip-it
description: A browser extension to snip code blocks and text selections from web pages. The tools lets you save and organize your code snippets in the cloud.

scripts.build: npm run build-safari && npm run build-chrome
scripts.build:dev: npm run build-safari:dev && npm run build-chrome:dev
scripts.build:test: npm run build-safari:test && npm run build-chrome:test
scripts.build-safari: npm run build-safari-js && npm run build-safari-css
scripts.build-safari:dev: npm run build-safari-js:dev && npm run build-safari-css
scripts.build-safari:test: npm run build-safari-js:test && npm run build-safari-css
scripts.build-safari-js: browserify src/snip-it.js -t babelify -t [ envify --NODE_ENV $npm_package_config_environment ] | uglifyjs --compress --screw-ie8 -o SnipIt.safariextension/js/snip-it.js
scripts.build-chrome: npm run build-chrome-js && npm run build-chrome-css
scripts.build-chrome:dev: npm run build-chrome-js:dev && npm run build-chrome-css
scripts.build-chrome:test: npm run build-chrome-js:test && npm run build-chrome-css
scripts.build-chrome-js: browserify src/snip-it.js -t babelify -t [ envify --NODE_ENV $npm_package_config_environment ] | uglifyjs --compress --screw-ie8 -o SnipIt.chromeextension/js/snip-it.js
scripts.build-all-js: npm run build-safari-js && npm run build-chrome-js
scripts.build-all-css: npm run build-safari-css && npm run build-chrome-css

author: Andrei Duca <duca.andrei@gmail.com>
